title: Latin rock - Gregg Rolie of Santana - Roots - 2001
description:
Roots is not as good as the first three Santana albums, but it&#039;s close. It sounds more like the band Santana in the beginning, than anything Carlos Santana has done lately. 
Gregg Rollie is one of the most underappreciated men in rock. He left the best incarnation of Santana to form Journey with Neal Schon, and eventually left to form Storm and do some great solo stuff. 
Roots is no Abraxas - but it&#039;s close.

Cover arts included.

Enjoy, please comment and seed!
